channel.title: Chapter 6: Anger on From Draenor With Love

item.title: Terokkar Tussle, Part 6
item.description: That does it for Chapter 6. One more to go! Itâ€™s funny, but itâ€™s looking like FDWL might possibly span the entire length of Warlords of Draenor. While itâ€™s definitely not something we planned (FDWL actually started a few weeks before the Warlords announcement) itâ€™s rather appropriate!

item.title: Terokkar Tussle, Part 5
item.description: Everyone knows the unspoken rules of pun battles! You should know better, Vid! Oh, and if you donâ€™t remember what that thing is that hit the sphere, hereâ€™s a reminder. Canâ€™t really blame you if youâ€™ve forgotten â€” that was a year and a half ago, holy crap!

item.title: Terokkar Tussle, Part 3
item.description: Welp, I sure hope Vid got insurance, because those Golems are not cheap! Itâ€™s a little strange hearing all the news about the Legion alpha going on, when weâ€™re still exploring the storyline of Mists here. Hopefully anyone reading this hasnâ€™t forgotten about everything that happened back on Pandaria!

item.title: Terokkar Tussle, Part 2
item.description: And in this moment, Vid was reminded that Kura and Rades are siblings, after allâ€¦ Thanks for your patience, everyone! Right back into the action! As always, your comments and feedback is appreciated, or you can find us on Twitter!

item.title: Terokkar Tussle, Part 1
item.description: FIGHT! FIGHT! FIGHT! (Okay, the Sky Golem doesnâ€™t technically have combat capabilities in-game. But it SHOULD. Look at those claws!)

item.title: Reunion
item.description: Itâ€™s been a long time since Rades and Vid have seen each other â€“ 42 pages, actually! Thatâ€™s half the comic!!

item.title: Faith
item.description: And weâ€™re finally back to the rest of the cast. ðŸ˜€ Itâ€™s been a while since weâ€™ve seen them!

item.title: Almost
item.description: Well, at least now Vid wonâ€™t have to feel bad about the Mechano-Hog getting destroyed. Speaking of, the real Vid sure was happy when she saw the script for this page, and realized she wouldnâ€™t have to draw the motorcycles anymore! Which just means I suppose Iâ€™ll have to give her something MORE complicated to draw nowâ€¦

item.title: Exit Strategy
item.description: A few people were asking what Rades was pouring out of that bag back on Page #80 â€” I told you itâ€™d be explained! Granted, maybe he originally intended to use it just as a distraction, but I think it still served its purpose. (We also love seeing your comments trying to predict things that havenâ€™t been revealed or explained yet in the story â€” we always get a kick when you guess right!

item.title: We Always Hurt The Ones We Love
item.description: I guess Rades shouldnâ€™t have turned such a blind eye to his sisterâ€™s behavior all those years ago.

item.title: Stealth Mission
item.description: First of all, curse you Blizzard for already using the funny joke! Iâ€™ve always imagined Rades (the character) as more of a scout than a straight-up soldier, so it stands to reason he might be pretty sneaky. Not sneaky enough though, it seemsâ€¦

item.title: Found
item.description: Annnnd weâ€™re back! Itâ€™s been a great month off for us to get our batteries recharged, and we canâ€™t wait to finish this story! Itâ€™s been a long undertaking, perhaps longer than either Vid or I initially realized, but weâ€™re confident that in the end itâ€™ll be one we can look back on proudly. Now that Warlordsâ€™ story has mostly been told, we can breathe a slight sigh of relief, as there was always the slight worry that some of the lore events might overlap or clash with what we had in mind with FDWL.

item.title: A Little Patience
item.description: Poor Vid. It looks like sheâ€™ll be waiting awhile longer. Actually, youâ€™ll have to wait along with her a bit too because we are taking a vacation for the month of July! For many personal reasons, this year has been exhausting. Iâ€™m proud we were able to maintain our schedule throughout it, but Iâ€™m going on vacation in July and getting ahead on as many comics as we wouldâ€™ve needed just wasnâ€™t feasible.

item.title: Orcient History
item.description: Aw yeah, going back to some old TBC lore! If you never quested through Nagrand as Horde, hereâ€™s a few links: http://wow.gamepedia.com/Jorin_Deadeye http://wow.gamepedia.com/Garrosh_Hellscream

item.title: Kura
item.description: I think one of our favorite things is designing new characters. Sure, it takes us forever because we usually have vastly different ideas about attire and equipment, and then naming them takes even longer as we toss ideas back and forth and examine existing naming conventions. But EVENTUALLY they get completed and then we can love them. ðŸ˜€

item.title: Chapter 6: Anger
item.description: Hmm, the title for this Chapter is sort of fitting, given the temperature of the WoW community right now regarding some things. Things that ultimately will not affect FDWL or its characters, however! After all, theyâ€™re on Outland. Everythingâ€™s cool there.
